verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Night of peace:
hail the holy child
breathing on his own.
Night of peace:
all creation smiled
at God's love made known.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Night of joy:
kneel at Mary's side,
touch the baby's face.
Night of joy:
feel the father's pride,
bless the first embrace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Night of love:
hear each waking heart
letting go of fear.
Night of love:
help us play our part
saying, 'Christ is here!'
